title: How to summon Satan in League of Legends

Summons Teemo Prime, post-rework 2017.
Back to the initial addition of {{item:3151}}  era, where Teemo had just recieved his Ult buff as well. Those were dark days.
He is simply ascending into his Final Form, do not be misled, as it is Leblanc, Thresh and Morg who are the true sacrifices.

That website has the bad reputation of plagiarism, deleting the original source watermark.
90% of the stuff is from reddit in the end.
and 95% of reddit's stuff is from 4chan

A good deal of stuff from Reddit is taken from 4chan, heck, they even have a board about stuff posted there.

The reality is that 4chan's nowadays cancer is called Reddit. Tons of SJW, political correctness, leddit bland humor, etc. Reddit is good for posting collective stuff, hobbies, but not for discussion (not that 4chan is worthy for discussion either, but it's better), also, all this karma whoring makes the community all about being boot lickers and posting weird positive humor.

That reminds me that on this forum, Rito is implementing a new upvote system, I guess it's going to be full of upvotewhores posting tons of stuff on the meme boards.

Saw this a few days ago and I still can't recognize whatever the thing in the bottom left is.
Spectator camera controls.
I love the fact that {{champion:17}} is in the center depicting Satan. Twas LOLZ

BTW The OP DOES realize that this symbol _**HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SATAN.**_

That is; the Pentagram concept existed well before Jesus was born, and generally referred to as a "Pagan" symbol.  It has been used by many cultures around the world, including ones not exposed to Western Monotheism (Jewish, Christian, Islam).  People who "worship" Satan may use this symbol (or stolen it more accurately) but by no means do they have exclusivity over the idea.


[WIKIPEDIA IS UR FRIEND](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pentagram).

I would say this thread is "racist" but LoL alas I wouldn't expect that level of intelligence from a Video Game Forum:  Alas the picture is nice though.
I'm sure he does, but being 100% correct doesn't make for a good joke, does it? At that point, it's just talking. ;P

> [{quoted}](name=RikoZerame,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=53BoqUni,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2015-05-07T04:41:30.123+0000)

LoL fair enough... alas it is funny how Riot has double standards on its enforcement of the TOU.  Apparently insulting millions of people who use this symbol is OKAY but using the
["R" word is FORUM BAN OMG WTF BBQ mode](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/zL7o1s5W-ludens-and-why-its-problematic?show=flat&page=2).


 ....alas I rest my case on the matter.
A pentagram is actually a symbol of Christianity. It has to be upside-down to become Satanic.
It's more related to wiccan beliefs and other similar religions, I think. However, in the public mind, it is associated with Satanism.
Awesome!
I like how you probably took at least 5 minutes figuring out how to set that up with your friends.
